      • nk_TicTacToe

        public nk_TicTacToe(int board_size,
                    int inline,
                    int max_levels)
        Parameters:
        board_size - specifies the size of the board
        inline - symbols in-line needed to win the game
        max_levels - maximum level of the game tree that will be explored by the program

    • Method Detail

      • createDictionary

        public Dictionary createDictionary()
        Returns:
        an empty Dictionary of the size that you have selected.

      • repeatedConfig

        public int repeatedConfig(Dictionary configurations)
        This method first represents the content of gameBoard then it checks whether the string representing the gameBoard is in the configurations dictionary If it is in the dictionary this method returns its associated score, otherwise it returns the value -1.
        Parameters:
        configurations - variable of class dictionary
        Returns:
        score associated with dictionary method if configuration else return -1

      • insertConfig

        public void insertConfig(Dictionary configurations,
                         int score)
        Parameters:
        configurations - inserts string and score into configuration dictionary
        score - score that needs to be inserted in configuration dictionary

      • storePlay

        public void storePlay(int row,
                      int col,
                      char symbol)
        Parameters:
        row - is the row position that stores symbol
        col - is the column position that stores symbol
        symbol - is 'X' , 'O' , ' ' used in tic tac toe

      • squareIsEmpty

        public boolean squareIsEmpty(int row,
                             int col)
        Parameters:
        row - is the position of row in the gameBoard
        col - is the position of the column in the gameBoard
        Returns:
        returns true is there is an empty space else returns false

      • wins

        public boolean wins(char symbol)
        Parameters:
        symbol - is the symbol in the GameBoard
        Returns:
        true if there are k adjacent occurrences of symbol in the same row, column, or diagonal of gameBoard

      • isDraw

        public boolean isDraw()
        Returns:
        Returns true if gameBoard has no empty positions left and no player has won the game.

      • evalBoard

        public int evalBoard()
        Returns:
        the 3 is the computer wins returns 2 if their is a draw returns 0 if human wins
